nodes.bodyText: Write errors to console if login redirects fail.
Why is this getting removed from the try?

Both networkidle0 and networkidle2 are ways to determine page load state by checking number of open requests.
I am experimenting with networkidle2 because sometimes tests fail in Home page after login. But nothing (checking screenshot and html file) wrong can be found. I suspect networkidle0 has bug.
Problem if any usually happens after click Next button (after entering password).
